content: materials - 4 6 7 skeins of purl soho s alpaca pure 1 100% super baby alpaca each skein is 109 yards/ 100 grams approximately 436 654 763 yards required we used the colors trout brown and yellow zest - us 9 5 5mm straight or circular needles 3 any length - a cable stitch holder 4 gauge 20 stitches and 24 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes finished dimensions approximately 6 8 10 inches wide x 70 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/alpaca-pure 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
